verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%>There <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G3686%G846>named<s%> <S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%>, a <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>:

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4461>Rabbi<s%>, we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G2064>art<s%> a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4592>miracles<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G4160>doest<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> , verily <S%G281><s%> , I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> , Except <S%G3362><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> again <S%G509><s%> , he cannot <S%G1410%G3756><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> .

<S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> when he <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1088>old<s%>? <S%G3361%G1410>can<s%> he <S%G1525>enter<s%> the second <S%G1208>time<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> , verily <S%G281><s%> , I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> , Except <S%G3362><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> , he cannot <S%G3756%G1410><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> .

That which is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> that which is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> .
Marvel <S%G2296><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> , Ye <S%G5209><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> again <S%G509><s%> .

The wind <S%G4151><s%> bloweth <S%G4154><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> it listeth <S%G2309><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> thou hearest <S%G191><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> canst <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> tell <S%G1492><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> it cometh <S%G2064><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> whither <S%G4226><s%> it goeth <S%G5217><s%> : so <S%G3779><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> .
<S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> a master <S%G1320><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> knowest <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> ?

Verily <S%G281><s%> , verily <S%G281><s%> , I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> , We speak <S%G2980><s%> that <S%G3754%G3739><s%> we do know <S%G1492><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> testify <S%G3140><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we have seen <S%G3708><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> ye receive <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> .

If <S%G1487><s%> I have told <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> earthly things <S%G1919><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> ye believe <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> , how <S%G4459><s%> shall ye believe <S%G4100><s%> , if <S%G1437><s%> I tell <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> of heavenly things <S%G2032><s%> ?

And <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> hath ascended up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> , but <S%G1508><s%> he that came down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> , even the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> .

¶ And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> lifted up <S%G5312><s%> the serpent <S%G3789><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> , even so <S%G3779><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be lifted up <S%G5312><s%> :

That <S%G3363><s%> whosoever <S%G3956><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> should <S%G622><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> .

¶ For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> , that <S%G5620><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> his <S%G846><s%> only begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> , that <S%G2443><s%> whosoever <S%G3956><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> should <S%G622><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> condemn <S%G2919><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> ; but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> might be saved <S%G4982><s%> .

¶ He that believeth <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> condemned <S%G2919><s%> : but <S%G1161><s%> he that believeth <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> is condemned <S%G2919><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> , because <S%G3754><s%> he hath <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the only begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the condemnation <S%G2920><s%> , that <S%G3754><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> men <S%G444><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> , because <S%G1063><s%> their <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that doeth <S%G4238><s%> evil <S%G5337><s%> hateth <S%G3404><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> , neither <S%G2532%G3756><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> , lest <S%G3363><s%> his <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> should be reproved <S%G1651><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> he that doeth <S%G4160><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> , that <S%G2443><s%> his <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> may be made manifest <S%G5319><s%> , that <S%G3754><s%> they are <S%G2076><s%> wrought <S%G2038><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> .

¶ <S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> he <S%G1304>tarried<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G137>AEnon<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> to <S%G4530>Salim<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3854>came<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G907>baptized<s%>.
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%>.

¶ <S%G3767>Then<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G2214>question<s%> <S%G3326>between<s%> some <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2491>John's<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2512>purifying<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4461>Rabbi<s%>, <S%G3739>he<s%> that <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>, to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> barest <S%G3140>witness<s%>, <S%G2396>behold<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G907>baptizeth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1410%G3756>can<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> it <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G5210>Ye<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G1565>him<s%>.

He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G3565>bride<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G5384>friend<s%> of the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2476>standeth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heareth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5463>rejoiceth<s%> <S%G5479>greatly<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3566>bridegroom's<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>: <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%>.
<S%G1565>He<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G837>increase<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1691>I<s%> must <S%G1642>decrease<s%>.

He that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> from <S%G509>above<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>: he that <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537%G1093>earthly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>: he that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he hath <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> he <S%G3140>testifieth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2983>receiveth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%>.
He that hath <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> hath set to his <S%G4972>seal<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G3358>measure<s%> unto him.
The <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G25>loveth<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hath <S%G1325>given<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

He that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> he that believeth <S%G544>not<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G3700>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
